description: Since 1994, this has been a vegetable garden that provides food for its members and the community.  The garden is used for summer picnics and barbeques.  Groups of neighborhood children often join the eight core garden volunteers working at this site.  The garden received money from the Brooklyn Borough President�s office to construct a chain link fence around the garden. Community board eight supports the permanent preservation of this site as a garden.
name: MaMa Dee's Garden
